titleStmt.title: The methode of phisicke conteyning the causes, signes, and cures of invvard diseases in mans body from the head to the foote. VVhereunto is added, the forme and rule of making remedies and medicines, which our phisitians commonly vse at this day, with the proportion, quantitie, & names of ech [sic] medicine. By Philip Barrough.
titleStmt.author: Barrough, Philip, fl. 1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the Blacke-friars by Lud-gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
